item.title: Production Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
``` [Medium] - Maintenance in Progress Summary: Backend maintenance is in progress, impacting site availability. Users can reach out to support for concerns. [Low] - Maintenance Completed Successfully Summary: Backend maintenance has been completed successfully. ```

Jan 27, 04:00:00 GMT+0
Identified - We are performing maintenance on backend systems which will impact site available. Please reach out to us at support@equityzen.com for any concerns..

Jan 27, 04:00:01 GMT+0
Identified - Maintenance is now in progress.

Jan 27, 07:22:52 GMT+0
Completed - Maintenance has completed successfully..

item.title: Equityzen.com outage
item.content:encoded:
Jan 13, 16:58:42 GMT+0
Investigating - Equityzen.com cannot be accessed at the moment. This incident was created by an automated monitoring service..

Jan 13, 16:59:12 GMT+0
Resolved - Equityzen.com is now operational! This update was created by an automated monitoring service..

item.title: Mass Email Sending Issue
item.content:encoded:
Nov 21, 14:17:00 GMT+0
Investigating - We have identified an issue causing our email system to send mass repeat emails out to many users. We are currently investigating the problem and will update as the issue is resolved..

Nov 21, 16:01:28 GMT+0
Identified - We have identified the cause of the email issue and are working on a fix..

Nov 21, 20:38:22 GMT+0
Identified - We are continuing to work on a fix for this incident. A potential solution has been identified and is being internally tested..

Nov 21, 23:31:49 GMT+0
Monitoring - We implemented a fix and are currently monitoring the result..

Nov 22, 16:13:27 GMT+0
Resolved - This incident has been resolved..
